A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't understand why this movie is getting such high reviews from critics. Technically it might look nice from shot to shot but the movie is so riddled with issues in logic\, plot holes and wasted opportunities that i struggle to find any merit i it whatsoever. Enough people have voiced their distaste so i wont drag this on. The actors did their part\, but the writing was dreadful.
